verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,-kaha vrajera mānera prakāra
svarūpa kahe,-gopī-māna-nadī śata-dhāra

synonyms: prabhu kahe—the Lord said; kaha—please tell; vrajera—of Vṛndāvana; mānera—of the egoistic pride; prakāra—the varieties; svarūpa kahe—Svarūpa Dāmodara replied; gopī-māna—the pride of the gopīs; nadī—like a river; śata-dhāra—with hundreds of branches.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said, "Please tell me of the varieties of egoistic pride manifest in Vṛndāvana." Svarūpa Dāmodara replied, "The pride of the gopīs is like a river flowing with hundreds of tributaries.
